article_title: Individual Buying Helps Fuel Twitter's Day One Rally
article_text:
As Twitter Inc.'s shares jumped nearly 73% following its initial public offering Thursday, buying from individual investors helped fuel the stock's maiden flight.

The attraction, small investors said, comes from their familiarity with the company and a feeling that the stock wouldn't follow the same path as Facebook Inc.'s troubled start. According to Barclays, which is the market maker for Twitter shares on the floor of the New...
